input.sentences: we took a tour of ancient civilizations in location . we started through a tour in a cavernous area .
we got a great picture of the hills and valleys of the land .
the water was so beautiful and clear .
and of course we had to pick up some beer !
it 's amazing the things you can see from history .
output.sentences: Gerado works in the mines at night.
He lives on an island in the Southern Hemisphere.
Gerado gives tours during the day to tourists who want to learn more about the island.
At the end of the tour he takes the group to the local bar to have a few drinks.
Whatever free time Gerado has left, he enjoys hiking the island terrain.
